verses.verse: <S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G2449>Judæa<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G1484>Nations<s%> <S%G1209>had<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> had come <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, they that <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G1252>contended<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>,
<S%G3754>Saying<s%>, You went <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G435%G99999>men<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcised<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> did eat <S%G4906>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G756>rehearsed<s%> the matter from the <S%G1620>beginning<s%>, and expounded it by <S%G2517>order<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2252>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G2445>Joppa<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G1611>trance<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3705>vision<s%>, A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%>, as it had <S%G5613>been<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3607>sheet<s%>, let <S%G2524>down<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> by <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G746>corners<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G2064>came<s%> even <S%G891>to<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>:

<S%G1519>Upon<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%>, when I had fastened my <S%G816>eyes<s%>, I <S%G2657>considered<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> fourfooted <S%G5074>animals<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> wild <S%G2342>animals<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> creeping <S%G2062>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4071>birds<s%> of the <S%G3772>air<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G450>Arise<s%>, <S%G4074>Peter<s%>; <S%G2380>kill<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%>, Not <S%G3365>so<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3956>nothing<s%> <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> has at any <S%G3763>time<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1208>again<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G3739>What<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2511>cleansed<s%>, that <S%G2840>call<s%> <S%G3361%G99999>not<s%> <S%G1537>unclean<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> was <S%G1096%G99999>done<s%> three <S%G5151>times<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> were drawn <S%G385>up<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1824>immediately<s%> there were <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G2186>there<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G3614%G99999>house<s%> <S%G3739>where<s%> I <S%G1510>was<s%>, <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2542>Cæsarea<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> go <S%G4905>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3367>without<s%> <S%G1252>discriminating<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G80%G99999>brothers<s%> <S%G2064%G99999>accompanied<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> we <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G435>man<s%>'s <S%G3624>house<s%>:

<S%G5037>And<s%> he <S%G518>showed<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he had <S%G1492>seen<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>, which <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G649>Send<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2445>Joppa<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> call <S%G3343>for<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%>, whose surname <S%G1941>is<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>;

<S%G3739>Who<s%> shall <S%G2980%G99999>tell<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G1722>words<s%>, by <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1722>as<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%>, the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5618%G99999>as<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3415>I<s%> remembered the <S%G4487>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, how <S%G5613>that<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> with <S%G5204>water<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> shall be <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.

<S%G1487>Forasmuch<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> the <S%G2470>same<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%> <S%G2532>as<s%> he did <S%G2254>us<s%>, who <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1161>Christ<s%>; <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2252>was<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%>, that I <S%G1415>could<s%> <S%G2967>withstand<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>?

<S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, they held their <S%G2270>peace<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G686>Then<s%> <S%G1325>has<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1484>Nations<s%> <S%G1325>granted<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

<S%G3767>Now<s%> <S%G1289>they<s%>, which were scattered abroad <S%G3303><s%> <S%G575>upon<s%> the <S%G2347>persecution<s%> that <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G1909>about<s%> <S%G4736>Stephen<s%>, <S%G1330>traveled<s%> as far <S%G2193>as<s%> <S%G5403>Phenice<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2954>Cyprus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>, <S%G2980>preaching<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> to <S%G3367>none<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G2953>Cyprus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2956>Cyrene<s%>, <S%G3748>who<s%>, when they were <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>, <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G1675>Grecians<s%>, <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G5037>and<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G706>number<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%>, and <S%G1994>turned<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3056>news<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> these <S%G846>things<s%> <S%G191>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3775>ears<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> which <S%G3588>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they sent <S%G1821>forth<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%>, that he should <S%G1330>go<s%> as far <S%G2193>as<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>.

<S%G3739>Who<s%>, when he <S%G3854>came<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, was <S%G5463>glad<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>exhorted<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%>, that with <S%G4286>purpose<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%> they would <S%G4357>cleave<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> were <S%G4369>added<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5019>Tarsus<s%>, to <S%G327>seek<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, that a <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> they <S%G4863>assembled<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%>. <S%G5037>And<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G5537>called<s%> <S%G5546>Christians<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3778>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2718>came<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> there stood <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G13>Agabus<s%>, and <S%G4591>signified<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> that there <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3042>famine<s%> <S%G1909>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%>: <S%G3748%G99999>which<s%> came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the days of <S%G2804>Claudius<s%> <S%G2541>Cæsar<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> according <S%G2531>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2141>ability<s%>, <S%G3724>determined<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G1248>relief<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2730>lived<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2449>Judæa<s%>:

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> they <S%G4160>did<s%>, and sent <S%G649>it<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%>.
